title: Tosafot Yom Tov on Mishnah Negaim
heTitle: תוספות יום טוב על משנה נגעים

text: ...It is for this reason that the Torah was exigent about not saying, "A blemish [has appeared...]": In order that he not open his mouth to prosecute himself, as we derive in the chapter, Me SheMeto (Berakhot 19), from [Isaiah's] saying, "Listen, you captains of Sodom," etc. Behold, it is possible that it proceed to lighten up before the priest comes...
